name: Remembrance, Sung in Ripples â™ª
desc:
When Cyrene uses Ultimate for the first time, all allies advance action by 100%. Each time Demiurge triggers the Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" during the use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes," gains the following effects based on the number of times it has been triggered in the current battle:
1 time: When Demiurge is on the field, reduces all enemy targets' DEF by 20%.
2 times and more: All allies advance action by 24%.
